'''Treasures of the Deck''' is a [[Card Back]]in [[Genius Invokation TCG]] purchased from the [[Card Shop]] for {{Item|Silver Raven Insignia|x=100}}.

==Description==
{{Description|Treasures are gained and used only for the moment, and their contents are never quite the same. What treasures lie within your cards this time?|Deck Design Settings Menu}}
